name: Wordpress-plugins
body:
### Mozilla's Wordpress Plugins

Make your blog a full blown web app that can re-engage its audience anytime and anywhere with the following plugins:

- [WP Web Push](https://github.com/mozilla/wp-web-push)
- [WP Add To Homescreen](https://github.com/mozilla/wp-add-to-homescreen)
- [WP Offline Content](https://github.com/delapuente/wp-offline-content)
- [WP Offline Theme Shell](https://github.com/darkwing/wp-sw-cache)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
